snippet: If you didn’t buy your ticket in Illinois, Kansas or Maryland, you are out of luck.
abstract: Mega Millions announces winning tickets for the record-breaking $640 million lottery were bought in Illinois, Kansas and Maryland; Americans spent nearly $1.5 billion on tickets.
lead_paragraph: If you didn’t buy your ticket in Illinois, Kansas or Maryland, you are out of luck.

headline.seo: Mega Millions Jackpot Split by Winners in 3 States
headline.main: 3 States Sold Winning Mega Millions Tickets
headline.print_headline: 3 States Sold Winning Mega Millions Tickets
